Config.Boss: Detects when a player attempts to force the company monster to attack.
Config.ChangToFreeMoon: Detects when a player routing moon from priced to free
Config.ChatReal: Detects when a player attempts to spoof their name as another player's.
Config.DespawnItem: Detects when items are unusually destroyed or deleted.
Config.DetectedMessageType: Decide detection message display type, PublicChat = Shown for everyone, HostChat = Will only display in chat for the host, GUI = Display in GUI.
Config.Enemy: Detects when a monster behaves abnormally.
Config.FreeBuy: Detects when a player ordering items without spending credits.
Config.Gift: Detects when a player having abnormal gift box interactions.
Config.GrabObject: Detects picking up items outside of default grab range.
Config.GrabObject_BeltBag: Disables players from picking up scrap with belt bags
Config.GrabObject_MoreSlot: Prevents players from picking up more than 4 items
Config.GrabObject_TwoHand: Prevents players from picking up multiple two-handed items at once
Config.Health_Recover: Detects when a player using negative damage to regen health
Config.InfiniteAmmo: Detects when a player has infinite ammo. Note that if a shotgun has already been given infinite ammo, a normal player using it may cause them to be detected as using infinite ammo as well.
Config.ItemCooldown: Detects when a player uses an item faster than they should.
Config.Jetpack: Detects when a player forces a jetpack explosion.
Config.Kick: Kick player when this behavior is detected.
Config.KillEnemy: Detects when an enemy is instantly killed.
Config.Landmine: Detects when a player abnormally detonates a landmine.
Config.Map: Detects when a player can able to control the ship monitor.
Config.Mask: Detects when masked enemies are spawned abnormally.
Config.Nameless: Detects invalid or anomalous player names such as Nameless or Unknown.
Config.NetworkSetting: Ignore network configuration differences and try to avoid 'an error occurred' dialog.
Config.OperationLog: Logging action made by the client.
Config.Prefix: Puts text in square brackets before the lobby name, leave empty to disable.
Config.RemoteTerminal: Detects when a player uses the terminal remotely.
Config.RPCReport_Delay: RPC report grace period, decide how many time passed everytime the clients have to report the RPC. (in ms)
Config.RPCReport_Hit: Enable Hit RPC report, when someone takes damage without reporting health lose, they will be detected. (invincibility detection)
Config.RPCReport_KillPlayer: Enable KillPlayer RPC report, when someone dead but not reporting by themself after that, they will be detected. (invincibility detection)
Config.ShipBuild: Detects the abnormal placement of furniture.
Config.ShipConfig2: Clients can only pull the lever when this player count is reached. (StartGameOnlyHost must be set to false)
Config.ShipConfig3: Clients can take off after this in-game time.
Config.ShipConfig4: Clients can take off when the number of living players in the ship is equal or greater than the specified percentage. (0-100%)
Config.ShipConfig5: Detects when a player attempts to force the ship lever. Kicks the player if detected.
Config.ShipConfig6: Allow your single vote to instantly force the autopilot when as host.
Config.ShipSetting: Only the host may land the ship.
Config.Shovel2: Allow players to deal damage without a weapon. Note that some mods that can reverses hotbar scrolling can also cause items to be out of sync.
Config.SpawnWebTrap: Detects when a player tries to spawn spiderwebs.
Config.Turret: Detects when a player forces a turret to go berserk.

log.refuse_connect: {steamId} attempted to connect to the game but was refused! (Already kicked)

Message.Boss: {player} detected attempting to force the company monster to attack!
Message.ChangeLevel: {player} was detected routing moon from priced to free! (Insufficient permissions)
Message.ChangeToFreeLevel: {player} was detected routing moon from priced to free!
Message.ChatReal: {player} tried to spoof {player2}'s name in chat!
Message.Enemy_ChangeOwnershipOfEnemy: {player} was detected trying to alter a monster's behavior!
Message.Enemy_SwitchToBehaviour: {player} was detected trying to alter a monster's state!
Message.FreeBuy_Item: {player} was detected buying an item for free!
Message.FreeBuy_Level: {player} was detected routing to a priced moon for free!
Message.FreeBuy_unlockable: {player} was detected buying a ship unlockable for free!
Message.Gift: {player} was detected causing a gift box to behave abnormally!
Message.GrabObject: {player} was detected grabbing objects from too far away! (Player coordinates: {player_position}|Item coordinates: {object_position})
Message.InfiniteAmmo: {player} was detected using infinite ammo weapon!
Message.Invisibility: {player} was detected to be invisible! (Player coordinates: {player_position})
Message.ItemCooldown: {player} was detected using an item faster than its cooldown would allow!
Message.Jetpack: {player} was detected forcing a jetpack explosion!
Message.KillEnemy: {player} was detected killing a monster instantly! ({enemyName}, monster HP before: {HP})
Message.Landmine: {player} was detected forcing a landmine explosion!
Message.Map: {player} was detected controlling the ship monitor abnormally!
Message.Mask: {player} was detected to have spawned Masked enemies abnormally!
Message.Nameless: {player} was detected to have an anomalous or invalid name!
Message.PlayerCarryWeight_Recovery: Carry weights have been forcibly restored!
Message.RemoteTerminal: {player} was detected using the terminal remotely!
Message.ShipBuild: {player} was detected placing furniture in an abnormal position! ({position})
Message.ShipConfig2: {player}, please wait until the number of people in the ship has reached {cfg} or more before pulling the lever, thanks!
Message.ShipConfig4: {player}, please wait until the number of people in the ship has reached {player_count}({cfg4}%) and the time has reached {cfg3} to depart. (current time: {game_time})
Message.ShipConfig5: {player} was detected attempting to force the ship lever!
Message.ShipTerminal: {player} was detected making too much terminal noise!
Message.Shovel: {player} was detected dealing abnormal damage to {player2} with a {item}! ({damageAmount})
Message.Shovel2: {player} was detected with abnormal shovel range, and damaged {player2}! ({damageAmount})
Message.Shovel3: {player} was detected damaging {player2} with no weapon! ({damageAmount})
Message.Shovel4: {player} was detected dealing abnormal damage to {enemyName} with a {item}! ({damageAmount})
Message.Shovel5: {player} was detected with abnormal shovel range, and damaged {enemyName}! ({damageAmount})
Message.Shovel6: {player} was detected damaging [enemyName} with no weapon! ({damageAmount})
Message.snc_player: [{player}] New creature data sent to terminal! ({enemy})
Message.Turret: {player} was detected causing a turret to go berserk! (distance: {Distance})
Message.Turret2: {player} was detected causing a turret to go berserk without a weapon!
Message.vote: You are the host, your vote can force the autopilot.
Message.vote_player: {player} voted for the ship to leave early. ({now}/{max})
